notes: Sound Blaster Pro and earlier cards do not always decode the least significant bit of the I/O port. Even numbered I/O ports that do not have an explicit odd numbered port will alias the even numbered port at both even and odd numbers

There is a known test case of a demo that {italic:requires} the aliased DSP write command/data port at 0x22D to work (it will hang at startup otherwise). {weblink:url=https://www.pouet.net/prod.php?which=6171,text=EMF Intro by Electromotive Force (1991)}
